:orphan:

:py:mod:`vqa.parameter_initialization._qaoa_interp`
===================================================

.. py:module:: vqa.parameter_initialization._qaoa_interp


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   vqa.parameter_initialization._qaoa_interp.get_new_layer_params_using_interp



.. py:function:: get_new_layer_params_using_interp(target_size: int, old_params: numpy.ndarray) -> numpy.ndarray

   The INTERP method for initializing QAOA parameters, from
   https://arxiv.org/abs/1812.01041. See Appendix B.
   To be used with LayerwiseAnsatzOptimizer as the `parameters_initializer`.

   :param target_size: number of returned parameters
   :param old_params: params that we want to extend
